text: Alexa Ellesse PenaVega (born August 27, 1988) is an American singer, musician and actress. She starred in lots of movies and TV series, among which are Ghost Whisperer, Evening Shade, Twister, The Glimmer Man, Nine Months and the Spy Kids movie series. Vega was born in Miami, Florida. She voices Carlota in The Casagrandes. ==References== Category:American television actors Category:American movie actors Category:Musicians from Florida Category:1988 births Category:Living people
title: Alexa PenaVega
